doc.name: ExceptionManagerGUIFactory
doc.description: This is an attribute that creates an editor for configuring and running the exception manager. This is designed to be contained by an instance of ExceptionManager or a subclass of ExceptionManager. It customizes the user interface for "configuring" the exception manager. This UI will be invoked when you double click on the exception manager.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee, Elizabeth Latronico
